text: The 1954 Round Australia Trial, officially the Redex Trial was the second running of the Round Australia Trial. The rally took place between the 3rd and the 20th of July 1954. The event covered 16,900 kilometres around Australia. It was won by Jack 'Gelignite' Murray and Bill Murray, driving a Ford 1948 V8. ==Results== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: left; font-size: 95%;" |- ! ! ! Entrant ! Drivers ! Car !
